title: Total New Beginnings
description: Does fate want them to be together after all?  When she was young she made a choice that she questioned throughout her adult life. Twenty years on, the chance to revisit that decision appears and she is left to consider what is right. But throughout this opportunity for decision review, she learns things about her husband that push her to question the soundness of his mind, and wonder why he married her. She now has a chance to start over, choosing this time to go down the path previously unselected. Did you ever hear the words â€¦ what if?
author: Ann M. Pratley
